name: Kubernetes Cloud Discovery
shortDescription: The Hazelcast Kubernetes discovery plugin provides the possibility to lookup IP addresses of other members by resolving those requests against a Kubernetes Service Discovery system.
longDescription: The Hazelcast Kubernetes discovery plugin provides the possibility to lookup IP addresses of other members by resolving those requests against a Kubernetes Service Discovery system. This plugin supports two different options of resolving against the discovery registry: a request to the REST API, and DNS lookup against a given DNS service name.  From Hazelcast 5.0, this functionality is built-in and requires no additional dependency.  Copy and paste the following snippet into your build:
